@graph.name: EVD 5: Issue-to-Experiment-to-Result Conversion Funnel — MATSUlab Discourse Graph
@graph.description: Evidence bundle for the finding that 18% of MATSUlab issues (n=389) were claimed as experiments and 36% of those produced at least one formal result node, yielding 44 total RES nodes. Contains the evidence statement, alluvial flow diagram, supplemental funnel chart, underlying data, and methodological documentation.

@graph.name: Evidence Bundle Metadata (JSON-LD)
@graph.description: Canonical evidence bundle metadata using the dge: (Discourse Graph Evidence) vocabulary. Contains the evidence statement, observable/method/system attributes, provenance, and references to all bundle contents.

@graph.name: Figure 5: Issue-to-Experiment-to-Result Alluvial Flow
@graph.description: Alluvial (Sankey) diagram showing all claimed experiments flowing through three stages: Issue Created → Issue Claimed → Result Created. Band width proportional to experiment count; color indicates self-claim (green) vs cross-person claim (purple). Researcher names anonymized.

@graph.name: Figure 5 (interactive): Alluvial Flow Diagram
@graph.description: Interactive Plotly version of the alluvial flow diagram. Hover to see experiment counts per flow path.

@graph.name: Supplemental: Issue-to-Experiment-to-Result Conversion Funnel
@graph.description: Supplemental aggregate view. Left: horizontal funnel bar chart showing progressive attrition. Right: stage-by-stage composition breakdown by claim type and result status.

@graph.name: Funnel Summary Data
@graph.description: Aggregated funnel counts, conversion rates, claim type breakdown, and result statistics.

@graph.name: Experiment Details
@graph.description: Per-experiment rows with title, creator, claimer, claim type, timestamps, result counts, and time metrics.

@graph.name: Methods Excerpt
@graph.description: Relevant sections from the full methods document covering node identification, claim detection, RES linking, and metric definitions.
